data.message:
Hi Eminem,, 
Dayle McIntosh Center is raising money to help more people with disabilities. My department is housing and I help people with disabilities that are about to be homeless or are homeless. Please donate at iheartoc.org/npo/dayle-mcintosh-center-for-the-disabled. Or if you can not donate Please click link below to help my employer win $1000 in a contest promoting I ❤ OC! https://goo.gl/u5htkC. Yes, that's it.
Thank you & much love, mari 💖
